name: #23 Duryudhana
description:
The Young Emperor of Astinapura, the eldest and the strongest of 100 Kurava.
Being the firstborn son of the blind king Drestarata, he was the crown prince of Kuru Kingdom and its capital along with his cousin Yudhishtra.

Duryudhana was the archrival of Bhima as both of them wield mace as their main weapon. In The Great War, they were destined to lock each other in a battle of titans until one of them lose their life.

Duryudhana was a brave warrior and said to be a good ruler. His greed and arrogance were the two qualities said to lead to his downfall.
